title: 117: Potty. I mean pottery. Wait . . . poetry. Nailed it.
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In this actually good episode, Graeme talks about readings of poetry. How do you balance a traditional reading with your own experience? With scales, friend. Scales.
itunes:author: Pottery, Poetry, Potty
itunes:subtitle: A haiku: Poetry is really neat. Not potty, silly. Why do they let me name things?
